byline.original: By JAMES B. RESTON Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Brit disclose research on German magnetic mines
snippet: LONDON, March 1--Admiralty officials disclosed today how five members of their experimental laboratory staff discovered the secret of the German magnetic mine in a dangerous all-night operation on the sand flats off Shoeburyness....

headline.main: BRITISH BARE STUDY OF MAGNETIC MINES; Reveal How Five Technicians Risked Lives to Take Apart New German Weapons FATAL SURPRISE AVERTED Second Detonator Found Near Core Might Have Been Set Off by Slightest Slip

lead_paragraph: LONDON, March 1--Admiralty officials disclosed today how five members of their experimental laboratory staff discovered the secret of the German magnetic mine in a dangerous all-night operation on the sand flats off Shoeburyness.
